resources.string: Enter a letter at a time, or guess the whole word. The word has %1$d letters. Good luck!
One letter at a time, please!
Only letters, please! %1$s is not a letter
You have already used the letter %1$s
You are right! %1$s is part of the word
You are wrong! %1$s in not part of the word
The word you guessed, %1$s, contain the wrong number of letters.
Congratulations, you won! You used %1$d of 10 tries.
Sorry, you lost! Better luck next time!
You are right! The word is %1$s
You are wrong! The word is not %1$s
